cu.explanation_en: Setting the DRB ciphering to an invalid enum value will cause security configuration errors during initialization.

du.explanation_en: Setting the hardware log level to an invalid enum value will cause logging configuration errors during startup.
du.explanation_zh: 將硬體日誌級別設定為無效的枚舉值會在啟動期間導致日誌配置錯誤。
